titleStmt.title: Reflections upon Mr. Varillas his History of heresy Book 1, Tome 1, as far as it relates to English matters, more especially those of Wicliff.
titleStmt.author: Hannes, Edward, Sir, d. 1710.
King, William, 1663-1712.

notesStmt.note: "By Edward Hannes, assisted by William King, LLD"--Halkett and Laing.
Place of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
